pk.contender.earmouse

Class Module

  • java.lang.Object
    • pk.contender.earmouse.Module
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Module>

    public class Module
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Module>
    Abstraction of a set of exercises that belong together, e.g. all basic major intervals.

    Manages a module's data and state, generates exercises and has several I/O methods for reading and writing Module objects.

    Author:
    Paul Klinkenberg

      • getLinearRandomNumber

        private int getLinearRandomNumber(int limit)
        Generate a random number between [0 - limit>, with a linearly descending distribution from 0 to limit.

        Example distribution of 10000 calls with limit == 5: Occurrences of 0: 3322 Occurrences of 1: 2630 Occurrences of 2: 2016 Occurrences of 3: 1371 Occurrences of 4: 661

        Parameters:
        limit - the upper limit of return values.
        Returns:
        a random number between [0 - limit> in a linearly descending distribution from 0 to limit.

      • getWeightedExerciseIndex

        public int getWeightedExerciseIndex()
        Returns an index to one of this Module's exercises that is random but weighted towards certain properties.

        Specifically, it sorts all available exercises first on success rate and then on how often they were attempted. It then uses getLinearRandomNumber(int) to pick one, thus preferring items higher on the list.

        Returns:
        A weighted index to one of this Module's exercises.

      • getExercise

        public Exercise getExercise(int exerciseIndex)
        Generates an Exercise that can be used by MediaFragment to generate a WAV sample.

        The Exercise objects in exerciseList are an abstract representation of a sequence of notes/chords. This function maps the Exercise at the given index to a random point between lowestNote and highestNote. The result can be used by MediaFragment to generate a WAV sample.

        Parameters:
        exerciseIndex - The index of the Exercise to generate.
        Returns:
        An Exercise instance that can be used to prepare a WAV sample.

      • writeModuleToJson

        public boolean writeModuleToJson()
        Attempts to write this Module to the device's local storage.

        Write this Module to disk as a JSON file, does not save the value of ModuleStats

        Returns:
        True on success, false otherwise (this happens if an exception occurs)
